events.name: data table discussion
events.description: Hi all, As a follow-up to our most recent session on dplyr, we shall have a session discussing the advantages/disadvantages of data table. We have two speakers lined up, but if you out there have been using data table and found it to be useful, please do come forward and share your views, if only for 10 minutes or so. The speakers so far are:- Gaurav, who will discuss some of the differences in syntax between dplyr and data table.- Nicholas Ng, who will discuss some of the speed-ups that data table provides. See you all then,Vik
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium (Singapore), One Marina Boulevard, Level 21 Auditorium, Singapore 018989
